h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: When this happens, you'll need to stop focusing on the boss and pay more attention to his weapon, which will keep spinning toward you like a crazed wheel with a fiery trail that can keep criss-crossing for several times before he grabs it again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When this happens, you'll need to stop focusing on the boss and pay more attention to his weapon, which will keep spinning toward you like a crazed wheel with a fiery trail that can keep criss-crossing for several times before he grabs it again.
